summary: Delia, a young Romanian girl, drives to Bucharest with her parents to collect a prize she won in a contest.
cast: Andreea Bosneag|Violeta Haret-Popa|Vasile Muraru|Serban Pavlu|Andi Vasluianu|Diana Gheorghian|Alexandru Georgescu|Petre Constantin Bombardel|Luminita Stoianovici|Doru Catanescu|Bogdan Marhodin|Cristina Serbu|Claudiu Dumitru|Marian Pîrvu
title: Cea mai fericitã fatã din lume
